Source.Name: Reportlab
Source.Summary: Our Open Source libraries are distributed as pure Python source code that runs on all platforms
Our Open Source libraries are distributed as pure Python source code that runs on all platforms
Source.Description: ReportLab, since its early beginnings, has been a strong supporter of open-source. In the past we have found the feedback and input from our open-source community an invaluable aid to the development of our products, and we wish to encourage the widest possible use and the maximum amount of benefit for our users in the future.
